name: Block Out: Slide Puzzle
description:
Unblock the Red Brick!

Play the classic Wood Block Puzzle game! Unblock the red brick to advance and progress through the levels!

Original Wood Block Puzzle Game with over 10,000 levels!

Train your brain, improve problem solving skills.

Features
• 10,000+ Original Wood Puzzles
• Play online or offline without wifi
• Levels based on difficulty, Beginner, Medium, Advance, Expert
• Hints and Undo features
• Collect stars and unlock new levels!
